info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 11:14AM CDT until May 9 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in New Orleans LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Mississippi River At Reserve affecting St. Charles, St. John The Baptist and St. James Parishes.
For the Lower Mississippi River...including Reserve...minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Mississippi River at Reserve.
* WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Friday, May 09.
* IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Slow-bell procedures will be enacted for river transportation.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 21.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday afternoon to a crest of 23.5 feet Thursday, May 01. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, May 09. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY, MAY 09

area.areaDesc: St. Charles, LA; St. James, LA; St. John The Baptist, LA
